description: Presidential Secretariat - Appoint Mr. V. Sivagnanasothi as the Secretary to the Ministry of Plantation Infrastructure Development & 25 other Secretaries to the Ministries w.e.f. 19.01.2015. Appoint Mr. Wasantha Ekanayake to the Ministry of Buddhasasana w.e.f. 21.01.2015 & Dr. L. Gunaruwan to the Ministry of Internal Transport w.e.f. 22.01.2015. Appoint Mr. P. Ranepura Secretary to the State Ministry of Higher Education & 08 other Secretaries to the Ministries w.e.f. 19.01.2015. Appoint Ms. S. A. D. S. Subasinghe as the Secretary to the State Ministry of Children's Affairs w.e.f. 21.01.2015.
